DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study ist to determine long-term safety and efficacy in weight reduction and improvement of diabetes mellitus of the temporary, endoscopic duodenal-jejunal bypass-sleeve EndoBarrier® in a national registry.
DOC.brief_title: EndoBarrier Register Deutschland-Safety and Efficacy of the Endoscopic Duodenal-Jejunal Bypass Sleeve
DOC.detailed_description: Long-term data are collected by approximately 30 German centers. An electronic Case-Report-Form (eCRF) was designed to collect relevant pre-specified items by the Clinical Trial Center North (CTC). All German sites that have implanted EndoBarrier® since 2010 were invited to provide patient results. Data-acquisition is projected to a period of 5 years and a maximum of 1000 patients. An extension of data-acquisition is planned.
DOC.criteria: clinical decision for treatment with EndoBarrier informed consent for registry participation Patients not meeting the inclusion criteria age < 18
